alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:55PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Deschutes County through 530 PM PDT... At 454 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of McKenzie Pass, or 20 miles west of Bend, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Deschutes County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
